data.title: No Limits Band Takes Weddings & Parties Beyond Expectations!
data.meta_description: The No Limits band exceeds expectations and ignites weddings, parties, corporate events, and special celebrations!
data.text:
No Limits Band: One of America’s Hottest Live Bands

Once the No Limits band takes the stage it’ll become instantly clear why they are one of the premier cover bands in the United States today, and why, when the rich and famous are looking for a premier band to play alongside Goo Goo Dolls, it’s No Limits they bring in. There is NO LIMIT to the amount of fun guests will experience when this high energy band is included on the guest list.

This band is not just any entertainment option. They are a musical phenomenon, guaranteed to transform your party into the must-attend event of the year. With No Limits, the name says it all. There are truly no limits to what your celebration can become.

“We hired No Limits for our wedding and we were blown away!!! By far the best band we have seen at any wedding, and we still have guests talking about them!! It was our best expense of the wedding weekend, and the most commented on part of our wedding. We even had some friends text us after the wedding that they were jealous they didn’t have No Limits at their wedding when they got married. They seriously brought the best energy imaginable – it was a party to say the least. We danced the entire night – there wasn’t one person not on the dance floor. We cannot thank you guys enough for making our wedding the best party ever!“ – Sheri Sussex, Bride, Sun Valley, ID

“WOW!!!!! Amazing!!!! Unreal in every way!!! Everyone in the wedding business around here is asking for the band information. Getting the word out there! Seriously – Evan and H had a blast and can’t stop talking about the band!!!!! They are in flight but as soon as we can – we will give props to the band on social media!! I was going to say – the wedding is the talk of the town but it’s the TALK OF THE SOUTH!!! I see many Seaside returns on their future!!! Thanks for everything!!“ – Willie Harrell, Mother of the Bride, Seaside Beach, FL

“We had No Limits perform for our destination wedding in Jackson Hole and they were absolutely fabulous! The wide variety and assortment of medleys was perfect for our mixed age crowd! They brought the energy all night long and we received so many compliments from our guests! Thank you so much No Limits! You were above and beyond! Love, Becca & Zack“ – Becca Landon, Bride, Destination Wedding, Jackson Hole, Wyoming

2020 Promo Video: The Sky’s the Limit with No Limits

No Limits stands out because they create an immersive experience. As soon as they hit the stage, the atmosphere charges with excitement. Furthermore, their dance music is infectious, ensuring that every guest finds their groove. Thus, the dance floor becomes a melting pot of moves and unforgettable moments.

“No Limits is by far the BEST corporate cover band in America. EVERY time they perform for one of my major corporate events, the guests are chanting their names, stomping for more songs and refuse to leave the dance floor until they do an encore. Some clients tell me that their male demographic guests ‘don’t dance;’ well let me tell you, they ABSOLUTELY do when No Limits plays. Not only are these band members extremely talented, they are the sweetest, most passionate and professional performers you will ever meet. Their stage energy, amazing vocals and incredible musicianship is truly a blessing to experience. I book them every chance I get, and trust me, you won’t be disappointed if you do.“ – Brian Hodge, Senior Event Producer, Special Events, George P. Johnson Experience Marketing, Las Vegas, NV

“No Limits was fantastic!! We had an absolute blast and all of our guests were raving to us about how good the band was the next day. Thrilled with our choice to use No Limits for the special day!“ – Joe Polychronis, Wedding Client, Jackson, WY

“They absolutely crushed it! Was the most fun night of our lives. The dance floor was packed after the first song and stayed that way all night. Could not have asked for a better performance!!“ – Andrew Peeples, Groom, Sun Valley, ID

Unleash an Epic Party with High Energy Dance Music!

This powerhouse band is one of the go-to groups for the nation’s biggest events. They received rave reviews for performing at Mardi Gras’ biggest and most spectacular party, “The Orpheuscapade,” alongside country music sensation Dierks Bentley and American Idol’s Harry Connick, Jr. The No Limits Band was also booked for the Baton Rouge Mardi Gras Ball the weekend before the main event, where they received more rave reviews. They are extremely versatile, playing some of the best dance music you’ve ever heard – from the most popular songs of the 60s to today’s Top 40 hits.

“Oh my gosh, we are still in absolute awe!! They were incredible and almost every single one of our guests stayed until the very end! Throughout the entire night, everyone was asking who they were and where they were from! We cannot say enough good things, they had the best energy! We loved the mash of songs and no one wanted them to end. I wish I could have added 2 more hours! Thank you so so so much!! Please tell them how much we loved them!“ – Jordan Tarbett, Bride, Vail, CO

“OMG…They were amazing! Our group loved them!!!! They had such great, high energy and played for 3 hours straight! Their song list was super fun, engaging and great to dance to. Rachel was great to work with and they said they had fun with our crowd. Thanks for getting them booked for us!“ – Marnie L. Andrews, CHG Healthcare, Salt Lake City, UT

Energize Every Moment with the No Limits Band!

No Limits’ state-of-the-art sound system and dynamic stage presence mean that every performance is not just heard but felt. The result? A vibrant, energetic backdrop that becomes the heartbeat of your celebration.

““No Limits” performed at our son’s wedding last weekend in Park City and they blew everyone away! They packed the dance floor from song #1 for 2.5 hours before they took their first break! Nobody could sit down. Many of our guests came up to me throughout that wonderful night and exclaimed their love for “No Limits!” My niece even came up to me and said, “Now I need to find a partner, get married, and hire “No Limits!” Another, whose dad was a promoter for “The Eagles,” said that he wants to bring “No Limits” to Minneapolis! Don’t hesitate, hire “No Limits” and a trainer to prepare your body to dance all night!” – Ellen Schmitt, Mother of the Groom, Park City, UT

“They were fantastic!!!!! The band kept our guests and, most importantly, the bride and the groom very happy and engaged all evening. They do one heck of a hora! The catering manager at the Broadmoor said they were the best band she’d seen! I’m sorry that I don’t have any more daughters to marry off (not really), but the No Limits band will be one of our go to bands for any other events we put on, business or personal. I’m sure to refer our friends to you all when looking for a great show band! Thanks to all of you for a great evening!“ – Susan Rosen, Mother of the Bride, Colorado Springs, CO

Turn Your Event Into the Season’s Highlight!

Booking No Limits is the key to unlocking a celebration brimming with life and rhythm. Why settle for mundane when you can have incredible? The No Limits band promises a night where every moment is a highlight, leaving your guests in awe and your event in the annals of unforgettable gatherings.

“Holy moly, this band really rocks! The dance floor was packed since beat #1! Thanks so much for helping us make it happen!” – Doug Schmitt, Father of the Groom, Park City, UT

“They were awesome!! They had everyone moving and grooving from the moment they hit the stage until the very end. Thanks so much for sending them along. Incredible vocalists and musicians. Please pass along our accolades to the band.“ – Mistine Boren, Event Producer, Napa Valley, CA

“OMG it was unbelievable!!!! We cannot say enough about No Limits! I’m so sad I didn’t even get the chance to talk to them and thank them in person but they were so so amazing. Our guests cannot stop raving about them. From the bottom of our hearts, THANK YOU!! So talented and fun.“ – Kristen Troyer, Bride, Park City, UT

Photo Slide Show of the No Limits Band

Lead singer Rachel is guaranteed to be the most energetic and versatile vocalist you’ve ever seen. Male lead vocalist Jeff makes the women swoon with his Justin Timberlake-style vocals and Michael Jackson-esque dance moves. Add third lead singer Marcus to the lineup, and this is one of the most powerful frontlines anywhere. With Jordan, a fiery lead guitarist, a hot and heavy bassist, and one of the most incredible drummers on the planet, crowds just can’t get enough. Add in some high-stepping dance routines, dazzling costumes, flashy lights, rich background vocals, and the most charming horn section (optional) you’ve ever seen and you’ve got one of the most exciting bands you’ll ever see.

“We wanted to follow up on our wedding from last night to tell you No Limits was FANTASTIC. They brought an amazing energy and had people dancing all night. Our guests have been raving about them all day today. Please pass along our deepest gratitude and appreciation for their performance.” – Brad Skaf, Groom, Sun Valley, ID

“The band was AMAZING! Our employees loved them and were so engaged in their performance. Thank you again for everything!” – Brooke Boyer, Veterans United, Chesterfield, MO

“The band was beyond fabulous – the client and guests were ‘over the moon’ with joy. Please let the band know how happy we all were and that they hit it out of the park !! WOW!!“ – Alisa Zapiler, CEO, Creative Events & Occasions, Denver, CO

“No Limits was FANTASTIC. We had several people tell us it was the best wedding band they had ever seen, and some of our friends even asked if they had a CD!! We would love to tip No Limits for helping to make our wedding such a success. What would be the best way of going about that?“ – Elizabeth Ewald, Bride, Park City, UT

No Limits Breathes Life and Energy Into Events!

Step into a world where every event becomes a masterpiece with No Limits, the party band that’s reshaping entertainment landscapes. This isn’t just a group of musicians. It’s a powerhouse of performance, ready to catapult your event into the realm of the unforgettable.

“Hands down, the best band I have ever seen!!!“ – Liza Kehoe, Bride, Jackson, Wyoming

“They absolutely crushed it. The dance floor was packed the entire time and we couldn’t have been happier. So many compliments for Rachel and her crew. People were saying they want to come back here and jointly throw a big party as an excuse to hear No Limits again, and my brother vowed to hire them for his future wedding (he’s single…).“ – Nick Parker, Groom, Wilson, WY

“WOW – what a killer event at the Montage. They are so happy with their celebration, they’re on their honeymoon still posting about the wedding and what a spectacular time they had. Thank you for all you and No Limits did to make their big day so awesome. Many thanks, and cheers until the next one!“ – Mara Marian, Wedding Planner, Montage, Park City, UT

“YOU guys blew it out of the park!! We had incredible feedback from so many guests that you were the best wedding band they had ever seen. Laura and Jason were equally ecstatic as were we!! Could not have been better! I will be mailing you an additional gratuity this week. Take care and we hope to see you again!“ – Nancy Downey, Mother of the Bride, Chicago, IL

No Limits Band! Delivering the Ultimate Party Vibe!

Step into a world where every event becomes a masterpiece with No Limits, the party band that’s reshaping entertainment landscapes. This isn’t just a group of musicians. It’s a powerhouse of performance, ready to catapult your event into the realm of the unforgettable.

“You guys simply tore up the Marriott at the private gig for AlphaGraphics Saturday night! An absolutely electrifying performance. High energy talent at its best! I’m part of the older crowd, and I STILL loved you! Question: do you keep Rachel in a cage between performances? Does your guitarist have more than the usual ten fingers? Does your bassist really know how good he is? If anyone asks me, I’ll be delighted to recommend you. Just amazing!“ – Steve Dawson, AlphaGraphics

“I wanted to extend our deep gratitude in creating a “Dream Come True” wedding for Daniel and Jacqi. The music at both the ceremony and reception was amazing. You rock! We have had the top band from Minneapolis and the top band from Chicago for our previous two children’s weddings and we thought they were great. But there is no comparison to No Limits. Believe me, if we had a fourth child, we would be flying you all to Minneapolis!

Thank you for choosing a great variety of music that touched everyone from my 87 year old mother to our three year old grandson. Our friends and family cannot rave enough about dancing under a full moon with you. The energy and love put into your performance was apparent. Finally, thank you for putting up with my sister for crashing the band. You were very professional about this annoyance. Please pass on our appreciation to the entire band and crew.“ – Susan and Michael Tewksbury, Parents of the Groom, Kamas, Utah

Transform Your Event into a Must-Experience Spectacle!

The band’s electric stage presence lights up the room, weaving a tapestry of rhythm and melody that captivates from the first note to the last. Thus, they don’t just perform, but transform your event into a live concert experience.

“A-MAZING!!! They killed it!!! The feedback from last night was so good!!! The dance floor was packed all night and the crowd was chanting and screaming for them!! Their video does not do them justice. We were all blown away. They were so much better than we thought they were going to be. And a fantastic group of people!!!“ – Jasmine Evans, Account Executive/Talent Buyer, G7 Entertainment Marketing, Caesar’s Palace, Las Vegas, NV

“No Limits absolutely CRUSHED IT. We have had a non-stop stream of communication from wedding guests who have told us it was the best wedding band they’ve ever heard and who have asked for the band’s name/contact info in follow-up. There were several parents in the crowd who have children with weddings coming up in the next few years who said they would like to fly the band to NYC, California, and beyond.

Rachel and team go beyond being talented musicians – although they clearly are VERY TALENTED. They are incredibly professional and were wonderful to work with every step of the way. They read the room and amplified the love and enthusiasm of the crowd on the actual day. The dance floor was packed the entire time; we all had a blast. So, thanks again for pouring your hearts into our celebration. It was fabulous and beyond what we could have imagined.“ – Chloe Lewis, Bride, Jackson, WY

Make Your Event Legendary with No Limits’ Magic!

The No Limits band is synonymous with professionalism. Their cutting-edge sound and lighting technology envelop your venue in an ambiance of awe, making every moment Instagram-worthy.

“WOW! Seriously, you guys were the best band I have ever seen and I have done this since 2004! Thank you for everything.“ – Heather Allen, Event Planner, Vail, CO

“Thank you for such an amazing job. I was super impressed. The energy and vocals were great. And thank you for having the timeline printed out and actually knowing what was going on. I can’t even tell you how many bands are coming to events without timelines and without knowing any of the details. They just completely rely on me to tell them everything. And it’s so refreshing to actually have a band know what’s going on before they get there and not need tons of hand holding. Thank you! Thank you!“ – Kristin Spear, Event Planner, Soirée Productions, Park City, UT

“OMG…it was the best band I have ever had at a wedding! Really outstanding and so professional and so GOOD. One of the guests said when their daughter is engaged (which has not happened yet) the first call I am to make is to book you!! Thank you thank you!!“ – Alisa Zapiler, Event Planner, Denver, Colorado

Dive Into a Sea of Dance Music Euphoria!

Hiring No Limits means choosing an unforgettable event filled with high energy dance music and excitement. Their performances are not just heard, but experienced. They leave guests talking long after the party ends. Therefore, for those looking to leave a mark, to turn their event into a landmark, the band offers the key to a door of endless possibilities.

“The band was AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!! They seriously made our wedding! Everyone had the best time! I have already passed your information along to many people as they were eager for more details.“ – Jillian Welker, Bride, Truckee, CA

“I cannot tell you how much we LOVED the band!!! They were absolutely incredible!! I have had so many people tell me this was the best band they had ever seen. We all felt as though we were at a private concert.

The energy and talent that each member had was amazing. Not only were they superlative singers, but the dancing and fast paced entertainment was amazing. They literally kept the dance floor packed the entire night. And they never took a break for 3 hours!!

The band was totally professional in every way. They made our daughter’s wedding a complete success! When we checked out of the hotel, the checkout girl said everyone at the hotel was talking about how great the wedding was!

I am so thrilled we had “No Limits” as our wedding band. It was a treat that each and every guest will remember for a long, long time!

Thank you so much for everything and please tell each member of the band that we LOVED THEM!!!“ – Jeanette Davis, Mother of the Bride, Vail, CO

No Limits Band Turns Parties into Unforgettable Nights!

Ratchet up the excitement at your event with No Limits. Watch as they bring unparalleled energy, unmatched versatility, and unforgettable memories to your celebration. No Limits isn’t just a band, but a promise of a night filled with limitless wonder.

“I have heard soooo much positive feedback from our employees and our board was so ecstatic about their performance. They are such a high energy group and really got our employees excited and dancing/singing along! We loved getting to have them at our event, they made it extra special!“ – Jennifer Lee, Federated Insurance, Owatonna, MN

“As always, they were amazing! The party never stopped until the lights came on.“ – Gerald Everett, Krewe of Neptune, Biloxi, Mississippi

“No Limits was hands down the most talked about part of our wedding. They are the type of band where nobody wants to eat dinner or visit the bar because they don’t want to leave the dance floor. I saw them in August of 2014 and they have only gotten better since then. Rachel is so great to work with and they NAILED our first dance, father-daughter, and mother-son dance songs! Afterwards everyone wanted to know where I found them and how to get them at their next event.“ – Alexis Janes, Bride, Jackson Hole, Wyoming

Dazzle Guests with No Limits! The Ultimate Party Band!

“Best band yet! No one wanted to stop dancing!“ – Traci Sterba, Baton Rouge Mardi Gras Ball

“People are STILL talking about how amazing the band was. Thank you so much for such a wonderful experience.“ – Lauren Brown, Bride, Sun Valley, Idaho

“A BIG THANK YOU!!! Your band is incredible. I can’t tell you how many phone calls, emails and text messages we have received about “our band.” I can’t thank you enough for your powerful performance. You made my dreams come true for my daughter’s wedding.“ – Emily, Mother of Bride, Wyoming

Hire a Premier Party Band that Delivers Unmatched Energy!

Green Light Booking offers national party bands that perform for the biggest and most incredible events in the nation as well as in exciting destination locations around the globe. They have performed their magic in states like Florida, California, Arizona, Minnesota, Oklahoma, North Carolina, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Nevada, Louisiana, Texas, Utah, Mississippi, Wyoming, Idaho, Colorado, Kansas, Massachusetts, Georgia, and too many other states to mention, and have satisfied clients in Cancun, Mexico; Bahamas; Virgin Islands; Toronto, Ontario, Canada; Dominican Republic; Cabo San Lucas, Mexico; Puerto Rico, to name a few.

When you book a band for a party, and you want to make sure they’ll be of the highest caliber, delivering quality dance music that’ll keep the floor packed with groovin’ guests ’till the wee hours of the morning, you have no choice but to hire a band from Green Light Booking.

Our bands are well-known for being the life of the party, the ultimate party entertainers that add extreme amounts of energy and fun to wedding receptions, corporate parties, Christmas parties, charity parties, and dance parties. Our exclusive bands are beyond good, they’re out of this world.

Let No Limits catapult your event into the Stratosphere!

If you’re planning a wedding and want to ensure it’s the most unforgettable day imaginable, know that it’s the wedding party music that will usually determine how memorable your special day turns out to be. Perfect weddings need the perfect entertainment. Our wedding music bands provide music that can’t be beat. They are experienced and professional; delivering music that perfectly compliments the desires of the wedding couple.

Whether you’re looking for bands to provide ceremony music, dinner music, or lively wedding reception music, or you want to find a band for an important corporate event, gala, charity fundraiser, or private celebration, our exclusive band options will not disappoint. Green Light is one of the top band booking agencies for good reason; we provide the best dance bands that can’t be found anywhere else at any price; bands that over-deliver day in and day out. When you want party dance music that’ll keep everyone on their feet, our exceptional groups rock it non-stop until the lights go out.
